Package ie.atu.sw

Class WordEmbedding

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.WordEmbedding
public class WordEmbedding extends Object
Since:
1.8 The WordEmbedding Class is where the file is load in the HashMap and check Similarity of the Word Embedding of this program.

    • setDictionaryFile

      public void setDictionaryFile(String filePath)

    • load

      public void load()
      load() function that loads in the file and store the contents to a HashMap. If it fail to load it will default to "word-embeddings.txt". If it can't find "word-embeddings.txt" it will continue the program.
